sections.heading: Frozen desserts; coloring matter; weight; butterfat content; ices and sherbets3-625
sections.text: Frozen desserts; coloring matter; weight; butterfat content; ices and sherbetsA. A frozen dessert may contain, in addition to the food constituent thereof, a harmless coloring matter, flavoring or stabilizer approved
